overview:
Seeby is a New Zealand Internet Entrepreneur.

At 20 years of age he founded one of the first ISP’s in NZ - Orcon Internet (www.orcon.net.nz) - and grew it without any outside assistance or capital into the 4th largest ISP in NZ.

In 2007, Orcon was bought by NZ Government State Owned Enterprise Kordia for NZ$24.5M

Seeby has started several other companies and has significant commercial property holdings in Auckland, NZ.

Currently Seeby owns a boutique business ISP - Voyager Internet (www.voyager.co.nz) - in NZ that has about 30,000 business customers, and registers 20% of New Zealand’s 500,000 domain names.

Seeby is regularly in the USA and Europe, and is in the process of expanding his business interests globally with a new USA based office for Voyager having been set up Q1 2013.
